author: cnbc.com
title: Entravision Communications: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
SANTA MONICA, Calif. (AP) _ Entravision Communications Corp. (EVC) on Tuesday reported a first-quarter loss of $1.8 million, after reporting a profit in the same period a year earlier.
The Santa Monica, California-based company said it had a loss of 2 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, were less than 1 cent on a per-share basis.
The Spanish-language media company posted revenue of $66.8 million in the period.
In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, the company's shares hit $4.55. A year ago, they were trading at $5.65.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on EVC at https://www.zacks.com/ap/EVC
